attributes.action: Mandatory drug testing for Members of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
MOP are supposed to set an example and not dabble in the crime of taking illicit substances.

The last petition was closed due to a general election and so I wish to create a new petition. One that will not conveniently close.
attributes.background: After recent events, it would be in the people’s best interest for mandatory drug tests to take place for members of parliament.
